text_trad: 4. 改善牙齒健康：糖分對口腔健康有著極為明顯的影響，長期過量的糖分攝入會導致牙齒腐爛和脫落，控制糖分的攝入則可以有效的保護牙齒健康。
text_tw: 4. 改善牙齒健康：糖分對口腔健康有著極為明顯的影響，長期過量的糖分攝入會導致牙齒腐爛和脫落，控制糖分的攝入則可以有效的保護牙齒健康。

text_trad: 綜上所述，減少糖分的攝入可以避免肥胖、糖尿病、心血管疾病、牙齒腐爛等健康問題，因此消除糖分對於改善健康是必要的。
text_tw: 綜上所述，減少糖分的攝入可以避免肥胖、糖尿病、心血管疾病、牙齒腐爛等健康問題，因此消除糖分對於改善健康是必要的。

text_tw: This technique was developed in the UK in the 1750s and became very popular in Britain during the 19th century, although its use was relatively limited in other major ceramics-producing countries. Most of the products came from the dominant Staffordshire pottery industry. The US was the main market for British transfer-printed goods, and the images were adapted to suit the American market; several manufacturers almost did this exclusively.

text_trad: Color transfer printing is a method of decorating ceramics or other materials. It involves using carved copper or steel plates to perform single-color printing on paper, which is then transferred onto ceramic tiles through pressure printing. The ceramic ware decorated using this technique is called a transferware or transfer-printed ware.
text_tw: Color transfer printing is a method of decorating ceramics or other materials. It involves using carved copper or steel plates to perform single-color printing on paper, which is then transferred onto ceramic tiles through pressure printing. The ceramic ware decorated using this technique is called a transferware or transfer-printed ware.
